patterns: I want to know about admissions
Can i get admission in suffa
responses: Admission are opened only once in a year in May/June/July/August.

patterns: Can i get admission in suffa

responses: We also offer courses in summers but only for improvement or passing the subjects.

patterns: I want to know about admissions
Can i get admission in suffa
responses: Admission are opened only once in a year in May/June/July/August.

patterns: can you tell me the minimum criteria or percentage to get admission in the university?
responses: Minimum criteria to apply is 60%. Further eligibility criteria details available on website.

patterns: can we apply on the basis of NAT tests results?
responses: yes, we accept it if you meet the specific criteria.

patterns: I am an A-level Student, can i apply?
responses: Yes, ofcourse A Level student can apply.

patterns: please tell me about fees structure.
responses:
Fee structure for:
Engineering department is 95,000.
Management Science departments is 65,000.

patterns: can we pay the fees in installments?
does suffa offer Phd and Masters programs?
responses: Yes, we offer both of them too.

patterns: is there any specific uniform for students?
responses: no, students can wear formal dresses.
we conduct mid and final terms after every 8 weeks.

patterns: how long does the semester duration is?

responses: Yes, negative marking is apply during checking.

patterns: Which grading system is followed in suffa?
tell about the policies regarding cancellation of the admission.
responses: if you fail continuously in 3 papers or having less than 2.0 cgpa in 2 semester, we drop that student.

patterns: when students get offers for fyp?
responses: FYP will be offer in the last year of degree.

patterns: Can we withdraw from any course?
responses: Yes, you can in the first 2 weeks of semester.

patterns: How many credit hours should we complete to get degree.
responses: It's detail for each field is available on website.

patterns: how many courses student can repeat at a time?
When will my admission get automatically cancelled?
responses: A student's admission will be cancelled automatically after completion of maximum duration (7 years) allowed to earn a degree unless extension is approved by competent authority.

patterns: please tell me about credit hours?
responses: One credit hour means teaching a theory course for one classroom-teaching hour each week throughout the semester.

patterns: what is the maximum and minimum duration of the classes?
responses: Duration of classes is usually 1 hour (3 classes/week) for core courses and 1.5 hour (2 classes/week) for electives.

DHA Suffa University was granted Charter by the Government of Sindh in 2002 and was established in 2012.The university derives its name "Suffa" from the rectangular platform called Suffah in Al-Masjid an-Nabawi, where companions of Muhammad used to gather to seek knowledge.
It's main campus is in DHA,Off Khayaban-e-Tufail، Ext، Phase 7 Ext Karachi.
Yes, it has 2 campuses, main campus and city campus.

patterns: what are the facilities available in suffa?
responses:
Suffa is built on international standard universities systems and working day and night for its improvement. It has multiple facilities. Like
1)High speed Internet. 2)Stand-by Generator.
3)Air-Conditioner classes & labs. 4)Masjid.
5)Indoor games. 6)Library & Auditorium.
7)Conference room. 8)Stationary shop.
9)Cafeteria. 10)Advance Engineering Labs.

patterns: is there any transportation system in suffa for staff and students?
responses: Yes, ofcourse. Suffa has point facility.
Suffa organize national and international trips during semester break.

patterns: Who is the chancellor of university?

responses: DHA Suffa University was recognized as a private sector degree awarding institution by the Higher Education Commission of Pakistan (HEC) in the year 2012.

patterns: are the teachers from technical side?
what type of teachers suffa have?
responses: Suffa has most top of the line teachers who have studied from abroad and vast experience in their respective fields

patterns: What is the total number of staff and teachers in suffa?
suffa strength of staff and teachers
responses: Suffa Academic staff is 121 and Administrative staff is 222.
